Quotes.quotes: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
Quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

Quotes.quotes: Good, better, best. Never let is rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best
Quotes.author: St. Jerome

Quotes.quotes: It always seems impossible until it's done.
Quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

Quotes.quotes: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor
Quotes.author: Elon Musk

Quotes.quotes: If you're going through hell, keep going.
Quotes.author: Winston Churchill

Quotes.quotes: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
Quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

Quotes.quotes: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Quotes.author: Confucius

Quotes.quotes: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
Quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

Quotes.quotes: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
Quotes.author: Helen Keller

Quotes.quotes: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try again. Fail again. Fail better.
Quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

Quotes.quotes: If you can dream it, you can do it.
Quotes.author: Walt Disney

Quotes.quotes: I don't believe you have to be better than everybody else. I believe you have to be better than you ever thought you could be.
Quotes.author: Ken Venturi

Quotes.quotes: With the new day comes new strengths and new thoughts.
Quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

Quotes.quotes: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.
Quotes.author: H.G. Wells

Quotes.quotes: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
Quotes.author: Ralph Marston

Quotes.quotes: The most effective way to do it, is to do it
Quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

Quotes.quotes: Either I will find a way, or I will make one.
Quotes.author: Philip Sidney

Quotes.quotes: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
Quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

Quotes.quotes: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week.
Quotes.author: George S. Patton

Quotes.quotes: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
Quotes.author: Aristotle

Quotes.quotes: Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
Quotes.author: Lao Tzu

Quotes.quotes: Knowing is not enough, we must apply. Willing is not enough, we must do.
Quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Quotes.quotes: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
Quotes.author: Mark Twain

Quotes.quotes: Don’t watch the clock, do what it does. Keep going.
Quotes.author: Sam Levenson

Quotes.quotes: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope.
Quotes.author: Bradley Whitford

Quotes.quotes: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
Quotes.author: Carol Burnett

Quotes.quotes: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
Quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

Quotes.quotes: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.
Quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

Quotes.quotes: Never retreat. Never explain. Get it done and let them know!
Quotes.author: Benjamin Jowett

Quotes.quotes: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
Quotes.author: Simone de Beauvoir

Quotes.quotes: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
Quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

Quotes.quotes: You will never win if you never begin.
Quotes.author: Helen Rowland

Quotes.quotes: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.
Quotes.author: Kyle Chandler

Quotes.quotes: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
Quotes.author: Jim Rohn

Quotes.quotes: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.
Quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

Quotes.quotes: We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us.
Quotes.author: 'A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

Quotes.quotes: Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.
Quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

Quotes.quotes: The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.
Quotes.author: 'Unknown

Quotes.quotes: Never give up, for that is just the place and the time that the tide will turn .
Quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

Quotes.quotes: Where there is a will, there is a way.
Quotes.author: Pauline Kael

Quotes.quotes: If there is a chance in a million that you can do something, anything, to keep what you want from ending, do it.
Quotes.author: Pauline Kael

Quotes.quotes: A will finds a way.
Quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

Quotes.quotes: No bird soars too high if he soars with his own wings.
Quotes.author: William Blake

Quotes.quotes: Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it's always your choice.
Quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

Quotes.quotes: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
Quotes.author: Ayn Rand

Quotes.quotes: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
Quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

Quotes.quotes: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
Quotes.author: Tony Robbins

Quotes.quotes: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
Quotes.author: Bo Jackson

Quotes.quotes: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
Quotes.author: Og Mandino

Quotes.quotes: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
Quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

Quotes.quotes: There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of imroving, and that's your own self.
Quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

Quotes.quotes: There is always room at the top.
Quotes.author: Daniel Webster

Quotes.quotes: Be kind whenever possible, it is always possible.
Quotes.author: Dalai Lama

Quotes.quotes: Perseverance is not a long race, it is many short races one after the other.
Quotes.author: Walter Elliot

Quotes.quotes: Your talent is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift back to God.
Quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

Quotes.quotes: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.
Quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

Quotes.quotes: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by the achieving your goals.
Quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

Quotes.quotes: Never complain and never explain.
Quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

Quotes.quotes: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.
Quotes.author: Epictetus

Quotes.quotes: You just can’t beat the person who never gives up.
Quotes.author: Babe Ruth

Quotes.quotes: Consult not your fears but your hopes and your dreams.
Quotes.author: Pope John XXII

Quotes.quotes: Think not about your frustrations, but about your unfulfilled potential.
Quotes.author: Pope John XXII

Quotes.quotes: Concern yourself not with what you tried and failed in, but with what it is still possible for you to do.
Quotes.author: Pope John XXII

Quotes.quotes: There are some days when I think I am going to die from an overdose of satisfaction.
Quotes.author: Salvador Dali

Quotes.quotes: End each day with thoughts of peace. Begin each day with thoughts of peace.
Quotes.author: Anonymous

Quotes.quotes: Don't agonize. Organize.
Quotes.author: Anonymous

Quotes.quotes: To look back all the time is boring. Excitement lies in tomorrow.
Quotes.author: Natalia Makrova

Quotes.quotes: Peace is not merely a distant goal that we seek but a means by which we arrive at that goal.
Quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr

Quotes.quotes: You cannot perceive beauty, but with a serene mind.
Quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

Quotes.quotes: Satisfaction can be found in the simplest tasks.
Quotes.author: Anonymous

Quotes.quotes: A soft voice is the sound of peace.
Quotes.author: Anonymous

Quotes.quotes: Nothing is worth more than this day.
Quotes.author: Goethe

Quotes.quotes: Peace is its own reward.
Quotes.author: Gandhi

Quotes.quotes: When the power of love overcomes the love of power, the world will know peace.
Quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

Quotes.quotes: Honor the past, live in the present, create the future.
Quotes.author: Anonymous

Quotes.quotes: Relaxation comes from letting go of tense thoughts.
Quotes.author: Frances Wilshire

Quotes.quotes: Be happy in the moment - that's enough. Each moment is all we need, not more.
Quotes.author: Mother Teresa

Quotes.quotes: Life is lived in the present. Yesterday is gone. Tomorrow is yet to be. Today is the miracle.
Quotes.author: Dr. Honey Snow

Quotes.quotes: Let loose of what you can't control. Serenity will be yours.
Quotes.author: Anonymous

Quotes.quotes: Relaxing is like playing an instrument. To become proficient, we must practice, practice, practice.
Quotes.author: Anonymous

Quotes.quotes: He who lives in harmony with himself lives in harmony with the world.
Quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

Quotes.quotes: We are never more discontented with others than when we are discontented with ourselves.
Quotes.author: Henri Frederic Arnier

Quotes.quotes: Be not forgetful to cherish the gifts each moment brings.
Quotes.author: Anonymous

Quotes.quotes: In acceptance, there is peace.
Quotes.author: Anonymous

Quotes.quotes: Those who are at war with others are not at peace with themselves.
Quotes.author: William Hazlett

Quotes.quotes: Peace of mind is attained not by ignoring problems, but by solving them.
Quotes.author: Raymond Hull

Quotes.quotes: Inner beauty comes from a stress free mind and a confident, giving personality.
Quotes.author: Anonymous

Quotes.quotes: Worry does not empty tomorrow of its sorrows, it empties today of its strength.
Quotes.author: Corrie Ten Boom

Quotes.quotes: Order is heaven's first law. Order is earth's first law, too.
Quotes.author: Brian Tracy

Quotes.quotes: Everything you do can be done better from a place of relaxation.
Quotes.author: Stephen C. Paul

Quotes.quotes: True peace is found in this moment. Acceptance is the first step to inner calm.
Quotes.author: Anonymous

Quotes.quotes: Whenever you are sincerely pleased, you are nourished.
Quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Quotes.quotes: A generous man forgets what he gives and remembers what he receives.
Quotes.author: Anonymous

Quotes.quotes: Nothing is so dear and precious as time.
Quotes.author: Anonymous

Quotes.quotes: The secret of happiness is not in doing what one likes to do, but in liking what one has to do.
Quotes.author: James Barrie

Quotes.quotes: There is no greatness where there is not simplicity.
Quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

Quotes.quotes: Set peace of mind as your highest goal, and organize your life around it.
Quotes.author: Brian Tracy

Quotes.quotes: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched- they must be felt with the heart.
Quotes.author: Helen Keller

Quotes.quotes: Nothing is impossible,  the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
Quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn
